pullRequest.title: fix: Use JSON string instead of java object for JMS message

commit.message: use json string instead of java object

nodes.bodyText: Can you just inject the objectMapper directly instead? unless you have a specific need for renderService
Should this really be log level info? I think maybe we should use the async notifier system for this? like we do for other info messages from the tracker (since its async now)
Should we just break out if == null ? then we don't need this extra level of indent?
Can you add a small Javadoc to explain what's the return type? I assume the String as key of the Map is an Enrollment UID

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -28,9 +28,11 @@
  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
  */
 
+import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;

nodes.bodyText: Can we rename JmsTemplate to JmsTopicTemplate so that it's clear what each template is for?
